title: Tundra Woman
description: The failed adaptation of the popular comic books. After a gigantic meteor collides with the Earth, the ensuing ice age advances with such rapidity that whole civilizations are buried in a perpetual blizzard. A new breed of human is born.
quote: Pengy, I’m like, totally bored. There’s just nothing to do in this stupid ice world.
altHero: Tundra Woman, a teen girl in a puffy jacket, flies in a craft with a penguin friend
alt1: Tundra Woman dances while her penguin holds a big stack of packages
alt2: Tundra Woman walks into the sunset on the arm of a boy
alt3: Tundra Woman as a cave woman eating a big drumstick
alt4: Tundra Woman near a giant yeti
